name: Alien Platformer (SP4R0W)
description:
by SP4R0W

Featuring art from Kenney & music by Joshuu

Description:

Guide the Alien through 5 different stages, each with its unique visual design and enemies. Collect coins, health gems and immunity stars to help yourself with stronger enemies! Can you run through all 5 stages as fast as possible without dying?

Features:

- Fast paced platforming action; You must be quick and decisive in order to survive!

- Ability to play from the game from the start or pick individual levels if you struggle

- 5 different unique levels, each having different characters and tiles

- Speedruning mode; Want to show off with your skills? Select this mode and then share your time! Available for both full game option and individual levels

- Pleasing atmosphere with graphics and music
